website_summaries.verdict: Subtle color and hydrating properties make this lip conditioner perfect for everyday use.
pros: Available in a wide range of sheer-finish colors
Has the texture of a lip balm, with the staying power of a quality lipstick
Moisturizing effects are long-lasting, lips stay hydrated all day without needing to reapply
cons: Colors are not very pigmented but can be built up

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Eh. This is my second lip product from Ilia, and I am not wildly impressed. First off, the colorants are artificial, which in my opinion goes against their whole "clean" shtick, and second, the colors (I own Arabian Knights and Around The World) bleed like crazy, even when the lips are prepped with primers, lip pencils, balms, etc. I do, however, enjoy the packaging. It is substantial and very chic, but what's inside is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zauberwald

customer_reviews.title: Ana Steele's signature berry lip!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I read that this was the gorgeous berry lip on Anastasia Steele's lips in the Fifty Shades movies. I purchased it and it is gorgeous! It doesn't scream that you're wearing makeup. The color can go very sheer or can be built up to look like a lipstick or stain. Plus it doesn't dry my lips. Great product and I will keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn's time

customer_reviews.title: luxurious ,, will buy again ,,
customer_reviews.text: my 1st ilia & really enjoying it arabian knights is beautiful color ,, 2b honest it looks so intense, really dark once applied they are lighter ,, perfect for my olive skin tone, easily tan under the sun so luxurious, feels on my lip & how it looks on me am natural kinda gurl, wearing this on my night out, romantic dinner, semi formal (wedding guest etc.) mixing it w/ pacifica lip tint creating another beautiful colour enjoying the packaging as well, small/compact so it will be good for small purse will buy again updating 12 july 2018; w/ picture, only 1 time applied
customer_reviews.author: matahari

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: Too sheer and wears off easily. I bought this due to the reviews of it being long lasting.... sadly untrue. It's a beautiful shade after about 3 or 4 coats. It just goes on uneven and too sheer. Would not repurchase
customer_reviews.author: Megan Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color.
customer_reviews.text: I am crazy about lipstick and have lots of them, but I am especially crazy about sheer, deep blue-toned lipsticks and stains. Think Clinique Black Honey, which I also love. This is a very nice shade that is brighter and redder than I expected but not bad. It has okay staying power, but will need to be reapplied after a few hours. I think the price was reasonable for a quality lipstick. Not sure if I will purchase again, but I do like it.
customer_reviews.author: DesDaz

customer_reviews.title: Nice color... But brighter than it appears
customer_reviews.text: Straight from the tube, I'm not a fan. It's really, really bright. Even blotting/dabbing leaves me with pretty obvious looking, unnaturally bright lips, even though it's only a shade darker than my own. I was just looking for something to make them look a bit done without looking like the Joker (full lips and bright colors can end up looking disasterously clownish). Cue the Smith's Rosebud Salve. That stuff is my go to for the just-a-bit-of-balm days and I figured its pretty, balmy shine would diffuse the otherwise artificial Arabian Knights loudness... I was right. Together they created a nice, berry-tinted, glowing shine that I am incredibly happy with.
customer_reviews.author: EMcNugget

customer_reviews.title: Got it on sale for $14 and love it! Wouldn't dish out the money to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale for $14 and love it! Wouldn't dish out the money to buy it full price but that's because I'm cheap haha but if you got money to burn buy away! Very nice color. Not super thick or dark as I might have thought, goes on a bit sheer but I think it's a beautiful shade. Feel like it would compliment most skin tones. Has a nice smooth, silky feel too.
customer_reviews.author: Madelynne Nehl

customer_reviews.title: My fav lipstick
customer_reviews.text: For me this is a perfect lipstick. It is deeply hydrating, sheer enough on first swipe to be used as a daily balm, and has color buildable enough to achieve a red lip.. This has moved into high rotation for me. If you're wondering about the color, Arabian Nights is a sheer cool toned red/berry. I have light/medium olive toned skin and a moderately pigmented natural lip color.
customer_reviews.author: RoseGlo

customer_reviews.title: It looks great after one coat and stays true for a long ...
customer_reviews.text: This has quickly become my go-to lipstick. It looks great after one coat and stays true for a long time, and is buildable for a more dramatic color payoff. Each coat goes on smooth. It is a little drying, but I've found that liptsticks with any staying power whatsoever are like that. This is definitely not a gloss, and swiping something a little more moisturizing on before adding this doesn't hurt the staying power or color payoff. This one survived cocktail, appetizers, and birthday dinner for me this year, and still looked great on the flip side.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Like butter and oil on your lips.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Be warned that the color is much darker looking than when it goes on! It goes on sheer! It’s a tint. Over all, it’s beter than Burt’s Bees and that says a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Holman

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this lip conditioner and couldn't believe what a great deal was available on amazon. It glides on smoothly, the color (Arabian Knights) builds up really well and looks great with my medium olive skin tone. I wish it lasted a bit longer on the lips, but will happily reapply for a more natural lip product.
customer_reviews.author: slpsam

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: What brought me to this brand was the healthy, non toxic ingredients. I was pleasantly surprised that the color is true to what is shown on my CRT, but it is not opaque, so it isn't overwhelming. It is not any better or worse in the wear department, it is not long wearing, but it feels nice to put on, and hydrating, and, I know I'm not in jesting nasty chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly the best lipstick I've ever worn! I have perpetually dry lips but this keeps my lips soft all day, no drying whatsoever. It adds just the perfect hint of color so it's great for daytime. And I found it because I was looking for lead-free lipsticks since most have lead in them. This one is lead-free, mostly organic and comes in recycled packaging. Love!
customer_reviews.author: L. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lip color
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Doesn’t dry out, buildable color. Wish it would last longer while wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and color
customer_reviews.text: As a busy mom I Don’t wear lip products every day and I’m very picky about which one to add to my collection but I would recommend this product to everyone! The formula is creamy and the color is just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: elisham

customer_reviews.title: Dry and hard to apply without much color
customer_reviews.text: The Ilia Beauty Tinted Lipstick is dry and hard to apply. I thought it would be smooth and creamy like other expensive lipsticks. It also does not have much color so you have to use more pressure to apply it. I am very disappointed with this lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: lswimmer

customer_reviews.title: Wish other colors are on sale like this color
customer_reviews.text: Wish other colors are on sale like this color. As for the lipstick, it is not long lasting and I have to apply few quotes to get good color. But that is not a problem as it gives me peace of mind to think that what might go into my mouth is safe and organic.
customer_reviews.author: gayathri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color from a largely clean brand--but the shipping
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color from a largely clean brand--but the shipping! Oy! Arrived broken and un-usable which is disappointing as it's a rare shimmer tone that still provides color in a non-sticky way. Had been very much looking forward to this after receiving a sample size from my local store. Will have to stay and shop local from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had found this brand 30 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick. Like - I’m crazy in love with it. It is sheer and moistures and stays on for a bit longer than an average lipstick. It’s not like the 12 or 24 hour lipsticks, but it stays on a few hours for me. But mostly the feel and the color are what I’ve looked for my entire adult life.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Channeling my inner ♡goddess♡ "Anastasia"
customer_reviews.text: I feel in love worth this lip stain on Anestasia in 50 Shades Darker! I researched the makeup artist and tracked down her product lines from the movie. This stain is amazing, perfection, inner goddess sexy...♡♡♡ Thank you Amazon for making one sexy little addition to my pouty lips that allows channel my "INNER ANASTASIA!" I'm smitten with the product! 5 stars plus, plus!!
customer_reviews.author: SandiBeachz

customer_reviews.title: It is moisturizing, but lacks in pigments, does not stay on lips
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick to lips, its like a magic lipstick chapstick style.
customer_reviews.author: Heyijustmetyou

customer_reviews.title: Just BUY it!
customer_reviews.text: favorite lipstick EVER! looks good on everyone. I love that it is a buildable color so I can go lighter or darker depending on my mood and occasion.
customer_reviews.author: girlmom#3

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cranberry hue
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much. Perfect for days when you don't want to look like you're wearing lipstick, but you need a quick touch of color. The only critique I have is that it's not really a dark "berry" hue as it may seem, but more of a cranberry/reddish purple. Either way, you can build it up to as subtle or as dramatic as you want and I'll definitely reorder soon!
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: Worth the splurge!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the moisture factor in this and that it goes on sheer but layers for deeper color. Perfect shade!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Bust
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this lipstick, but for me it’s just a gloss with a tint. No staying power.
customer_reviews.author: Amandaleigh

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE... but it looks glossier than a stick bought at Sephora. I'm not sure if it's the real deal, but it does look nice and I use it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick. It was used on Mrs Grey in the movie.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy M.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick! No questionable ingredients and is long lasting. Can wear it with just one coat or more for deeper color.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, does not last
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color but does not last long on your list.
customer_reviews.author: Halli Szarzynski

customer_reviews.title: Clean Beauty Win!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this liptstick. It’s creamy without skipping, it comes off as more of a red toned berry on me. It’s glossy so it’s wear time isn’t super long but it does fade beautifully leaving a lip stain behind.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED STOLEN GOODS
customer_reviews.text: ***THESE ARE STOLLEN GOODS & EXPIRED*** Please visit an approved ILIA retailer found on the company website to ensure you are getting the correct and most recent product.
customer_reviews.author: ILIABeauty

customer_reviews.title: I love this lipstick so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick so much! I've been using this almost everyday for the last two years. You can easily build up to a darker shade, and I personally think it looks flattering on everyone. (Also on the plus side, it's all organic!)
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: I like their blush a lot
customer_reviews.text: the lipstick fades . I like their blush a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Hecka

customer_reviews.title: great price. Feels great on my lips with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great price. Feels great on my lips with a natural tinted look.
customer_reviews.author: Kailani

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it to go on thicker and look like Ana's in the movie
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. I wanted it to go on thicker and look like Ana's in the movie, but it's sheer and more like a gloss. It's definitely pretty though!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I love the color and it keeps my lips hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: The color is pretty, a little bit transparent like normal tinted lip ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is pretty, a little bit transparent like normal tinted lip balm. But the smell is so weird, like old oil :(
customer_reviews.author: Thanabodee Horwiwatthananon

customer_reviews.title: A Winner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love Ilia lipstick (Arabian Knights) It goes on smooth, covers well, love shade,, best of all its healthy for my lips! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Hill

customer_reviews.title: needs to be reapplied some but very hydrating and easily layered for depth
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color, needs to be reapplied some but very hydrating and easily layered for depth.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey K.

customer_reviews.title: but leaves a nice color on lips
customer_reviews.text: Not hydrating as i expected, but leaves a nice color on lips.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Gangi

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Wanted better!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I saw it on the girl on 50 Shades and had to have it. It's a bit more like a tinted balm than lipstick and you cannot get a deep color unless you glop it on. It feathers on my lips and just doesn't stay on. Sadly, it melted in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Eden

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars - simply beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Such a lovely color, scent, and beautiful packaging & ingredients. I would give it 6 stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: diabia4

customer_reviews.title: LOVE - Amazing color and quality
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this lipstick. It goes on sheer and you can deepen the color to your preference with additional layers. It's moisturizing, doesn't feel waxy, and has a great rich color that's neither too berry nor too red. Gorgeous. Seems to stay on for a good amount of time as well, though it'll lighten up. Easy to reapply to a darker shade if desired. Not to mention it was the color used in the second 50 Shades of Grey. Sexy, adult, romantic color and a quality lipstick. Highly recommend. I also suspect this color would be good for multiple shades of skin tone - I'm pretty fair, but it seems like it'd be good on warmer and darker tones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Durkin

customer_reviews.title: Nice lipstick but not the darker as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I'm putting four stars is because the lipstick itself is a deceiving color and even on the picture it looks darker than the stick in my hand. I don't like giving less than the high reviews. Overall it's a great lipstick in the way of feeling moisturizing and smoothly going on, but as for it being darker know. It's more of a pinkish red as my photo shows. I decided to keep it since I need a new good lipstick this more basic color anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Morgann

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I got the color Arabian nights. The seller was great shipped in a timely manner and everything but the product itself was somewhat meh. The color is very buildable which is a plus but not really moisturizing. I have to use in conjunction with my lip balm so it doesn’t dry out my lips which doesn’t really bother me because I prefer a more sheer application. I do have to say that the more you build it the thicker is is and it is slightly more moisturizing. All in all I was expecting more from ILIA; however, I will continue to try more colors of this lip product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail

customer_reviews.title: Very Clean Expense
customer_reviews.text: This has a spicy flavor hint which i find intriguing. Goes on smooth and you feel the moisture, but i was expecting a darker berry red. This is more of a ruby. With a name like arabian nights, i was hoping for a berry plum. It's not an over powering ruby with one or two swipes and you don't need a lot to get the moisture. The color doesn't stain or last that long. It's just a little pricey on the regular though. I tried this one for half price. Happy i did, it is one of the cleanest lippies you will find, being smoother than others that are pricier. So you decide.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading that it was used on Dakota Johnson in Fifty Shades. Her lip color was so great in that film and I really wanted to recreate it. However, this color did not come out a nice berry tone on me. It was more pinky and not really the look I was going for. The formula is moisturizing but also doesn't stay on very long. I definitely don't think this is worth the price as you can get drugstore lipsticks which are just as nice but longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Miss T E Howes

customer_reviews.title: Nice color tint.
customer_reviews.text: This tinted lipstick is a nice colored tint for your lips. The Arabian Knights has enough of a tint to put color on your lips. I like all the ILIA beauty products I have used. They are made from clean ingredients and I feel good using them. The product came in the original box and was well packaged by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great natural color
customer_reviews.text: (Arabian Knights) Smooth, lovely flush of color. Buildable. I do find I reapply quite often since I like more color but it looks natural and flatters my pale skin and dark hair. It does stain the lips so if you just want a natural look you may not need to reapply as often. Great fo summer as it provides a lovely berry flush without being sticky and heavy. I will certainly repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phlys

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this lipstick ... love everything about this lipstick and the brand. Trying to decide what color to buy next!
customer_reviews.author: The DuRochers

customer_reviews.title: Natural, moisturizing stay put color!
customer_reviews.text: I’m only buying natural cosmetics and this lipstick rocks. The color is beautiful and the color lasts (not like a lip stain, but great considering it’s moisturizing). My dry lips feel supple and happy when I use this. I’m buying more colors!
customer_reviews.author: cyberswirl

customer_reviews.title: Current Everyday Favorite
customer_reviews.text: The texture is so beautiful. I was expecting a slippery, super moisturizing formula, and although it is moisturizing, it isn't "melt in the sun" buttery, which I enjoy because it gives the formula some integrity. Also, the color is stunning -- a your lips but redder color. Sultry yet natural.
customer_reviews.author: Ines

customer_reviews.title: A great everyday lip product
customer_reviews.text: Nice smooth formula, very light but buildable color. Flattering shade for my skin tone (medium-fair with yellow&pink undertones).
customer_reviews.author: tennis nut

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel , nice color not an all day stay on color
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, looks good, a little more than tinted color. The more you put the more color it gives. However it does not stay on after eating.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: I love how moisturizing this lipstick is! It glides on easily and it also doubles as a stain. The more layers you put it on the darker the shade will be. Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color, hydrates my lips and it's cruelty free!
customer_reviews.text: It layers on easily for deeper color. I use this as a daily, cruelty free alternative to Fresh's Lip Sugar. Incredible find!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: beautiful color on my fair skin
customer_reviews.text: love the color , it is sheer or more color if you layer it on. very moisturizing for lips .
customer_reviews.author: Crookedrow

customer_reviews.title: Too pink to be called berry
customer_reviews.text: I read this was supposed to be a plum stain and it looks like a plum, its just a subtle pink. It’s feels great but I’m disappointed in the color.
customer_reviews.author: momplusmakeup

customer_reviews.title: Not like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Color is nothing like the picture..feels like putting on a crayon instead of a lipstick. Looks orange instead of Berry. Won’t order this again
customer_reviews.author: M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive in comparison to other stores , love it
customer_reviews.author: Magy

customer_reviews.title: NOT Ana Steele's signature berry lip
customer_reviews.text: ILIA Beauty Tinted Women's Lipstick, Arabian Knights (Berry), does not tint as some reviews have said, goes on too sheer.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Prompt shipment.
customer_reviews.text: Love this color.. as featured on Dakota Johnson in Fifty Shades Darker.
customer_reviews.author: LjM96

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Has no color when applied just a light sheer tint hardly visible. Expecting color tint but very dissapounted
customer_reviews.author: Pablo J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. But I agree with a previous buyer it is not a long lasting color and does wear off easy. Very unhappy with this purchase for the price
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!
customer_reviews.text: This color is awesome! Not as dark as it looks! Stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: wnp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the shade, love the creamy texture. Feels great on my lips!
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I like the lipstick but the color is a bit off
customer_reviews.text: I like the lipstick but the color is a bit off, it looks more berry toned in the photo but in person it has more of a redish tone.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color was beautiful but dried out my lips a bit. Be careful it’s very soft and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Get soft, silky & pretty lips with this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It goes on so smoothly & leaves my lips feeling soft & silky. The colour is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Too Dry
customer_reviews.text: It is very dry. Does not go on well. When I went to put it on for the first time it felt like hard wax. I dont recommend this product. If your looking for a sheer lipstick with a nice color I recommend Beauty Counter and its all natural smells like vanilla and very hydrating.
customer_reviews.author: Anabell77

product_meta.title: ILIA - Organic Tinted Lip Conditioner | Cruelty-Free, Clean Beauty (Arabian Knights (Berry))
product_meta.description: Color:Arabian Knights (Berry)Infused with cocoa butter and jojoba oil to soften and vitamin e and pomegranate seed extract to heal and moisturize, hydrating, anti-aging benefits to the lips. A sheer touch of color that can be built up in intensity when applied liberally.
feature_bullets: A Cult Classic - Beautifully Lightweight Lip Color Meets Nourishing Balm
In The World Of Lipstick & Lip Balms, This Award-Winning Tinted Lip Conditioner Finds Middle Ground And Provide A Good Dose Of Lip Care With Color

Blended With A High Percentage Of Organic Ingredients, And Available In A Wide Variety Of Shades, It’s A Must Have For Those Who Don’t Want To Use A Mirror But Do Want To Pull A Chic, Understated Case Out Of Their Bag. Built For Those On-the-Go, With Color That Nourishes And Builds On Each Swipe, It’s No Coincidence The Initials Are TLC
